name: A Crowned Man Pointing to his Eyes and Holding a Net over a Bird
description: A Crowned Man Pointing to his Eyes and Holding a Net over a Bird; Unknown; Trier (probably), Germany; third quarter of 15th century; Pen and black ink and colored washes on paper; Leaf: 28.7 x 20.6 cm (11 5/16 x 8 1/8 in.); Ms. Ludwig XV 1, fol. 28v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: A Crowned Man Pointing to his Eyes and Holding a Net over a Bird
medium: Pen and black ink and colored washes on paper
